title: Haha wa Sexy Idol
description:
From MU:

Tomoya's father has remarried, and his mother is the sexy model Fumina Rando. Now he has to listen to his parents have wall-banging sex in the room next to his! He can't sleep a wink and seeing her dynamite body every morning is sheer torture. She tries to act like a mother to him and he furiously rejects her every time. But when she catches him sniffing her lingerie she's not angry, she's relieved. Soon Tomoya learns all his mother wants his love and devotion--and not just as her son!

Other stories include: Hot Kasumi House; My Loving Maid; The Over-Protected Wife; Night Work; Gemini Sex.
